meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice; (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)

vlive.korean: 좋겠습니다. it would be good. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][S] HYUNGWON DAY
하였으면 좋겠습니다! a great night! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ONF] 토루 얼굴에 별자리는 내가 누울 자리...⭐️ (HYOJIN talking about the mole on his face)
건강 항상 잘 챙겼으면 좋겠습니다 이따 또 만나요! Stay safe, see ya! 듣기 View video NCT : 시즈니와 너클 펀치💚💚💚💚
많이 많이 기대해주셨으면 좋겠습니다 파이팅! Please look forward to the new album. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [늉포차] "스페셜 안주에 진심인 편" (NU'EST)
vlive.english: Please look forward to the new album.

vlive.korean: 오늘 하루 여러분들 달콤하셨으면 좋겠습니다! "I hope your day today will be sweet!" 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: "I hope your day today will be sweet!"

examples.korean: We’d like as many people as possible to attend. 발음듣기 가능하면 많은 분들이 참석해 주시면 좋겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’d like as many people as possible to attend. 발음

examples.korean: We prefer CIF Busan to FOB Oakland. 발음듣기 FOB 오클랜드보다 CIF 부산이 좋겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We prefer CIF Busan to FOB Oakland. 발음

examples.korean: It would be great to see you again. 발음듣기 당신을 다시 뵐 수 있으면 대단히 좋겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: It would be great to see you again. 발음

examples.korean: It would be great if you could meet us there. 발음듣기 그곳에서 뵐 수 있으면 좋겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: It would be great if you could meet us there. 발음

examples.korean: It'll be wonderful to catch up with you soon. 발음듣기 조만간 만나뵐 수 있으면 좋겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: It'll be wonderful to catch up with you soon. 발음
